ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and does not urge the feeding of the poor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And does not induce others to feed the needy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and urges not the feeding of the needy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and never encourages the feeding of the destitute.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And does not urge to feed the needy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And urges not the feeding of Al-Miskin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And does not urge (others) to feed the poor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and urges not the feeding of the needy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And urgeth not the feeding of the needy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and who does not urge the feeding of the poor?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And urgeth not the feeding of the poor,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and does not urge the feeding of the needy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And encourages not the feeding of the indigent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And urges not the feeding of AlMiskin (the poor),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and does not urge others to feed the needy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [107:3] and does not urge, either himself or others [to], the feeding of the needy: this was revealed regarding al-‘Āsī b. Wā’il or al-Walīd b. al-Mughīra.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And urgeth not) nor observe (the feeding of the needy) giving alms to the needy.
